security()) { $this->echo_data('');$this->echo_data(' ');// BEGIN column $_column_count = (isset($this->_tpldata['column.'])) ? sizeof($this->_tpldata['column.']) : 0; if ($_column_count) { for ($_column_i = 0; $_column_i < $_column_count; $_column_i++) { $this->echo_data(' ');}} // END column $this->echo_data(' ');// BEGIN row $_row_count = (isset($this->_tpldata['row.'])) ? sizeof($this->_tpldata['row.']) : 0; if ($_row_count) { for ($_row_i = 0; $_row_i < $_row_count; $_row_i++) { $this->echo_data(' ');// BEGIN row_column $_row_column_count = (isset($this->_tpldata['row.'][$_row_i]['row_column.'])) ? sizeof($this->_tpldata['row.'][$_row_i]['row_column.']) : 0; if ($_row_column_count) { for ($_row_column_i = 0; $_row_column_i < $_row_column_count; $_row_column_i++) { $this->echo_data(' ');}} // END row_column $this->echo_data(' ');}} // END row $this->echo_data('
' . ((isset($this->_tpldata['.'][0]['MODULE_NAME'])) ? $this->_tpldata['.'][0]['MODULE_NAME'] : '') . '
echo_data('"thCornerL"');// ELSEIF column.LAST_COLUMN } elseif ($this->_tpldata['column.'][$_column_i]['LAST_COLUMN']) { $this->echo_data('"thCornerR"');// ELSE } else { $this->echo_data('"thTop"');// ENDIF } $this->echo_data(' align="center" width="' . ((isset($this->_tpldata['column.'][$_column_i]['WIDTH'])) ? $this->_tpldata['column.'][$_column_i]['WIDTH'] : '') . '%">' . ((isset($this->_tpldata['row.'][$_row_i]['row_column.'][$_row_column_i]['ALIGN'])) ? $this->_tpldata['row.'][$_row_i]['row_column.'][$_row_column_i]['ALIGN'] : '') . '" width="' . ((isset($this->_tpldata['row.'][$_row_i]['row_column.'][$_row_column_i]['WIDTH'])) ? $this->_tpldata['row.'][$_row_i]['row_column.'][$_row_column_i]['WIDTH'] : '') . '%">' .
